images.alt_text: AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Italy in summer, showcasing sunny landscapes and outdoor dining experiences.
AI-selected These destination images will highlight key attractions in Italy, showcasing picturesque views of landmarks like Rome, Venice, and the Amalfi Coast.

assetRequirements.purpose: main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Italy in summer
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and warm with summer elements
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting beautiful landscapes of Italy, showcasing beaches, vineyards, and cultural sites
featuring iconic locations like Rome, Venice, and Amalfi Coast
showcasing summer festivals, beach activities, and culinary experiences

usageInstructions.placement: Place at top of email as main header image with full width
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Летние мечты в Италии. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected This hero image will serve as the main visual to capture attention and convey the essence of Italy in summer, showcasing sunny landscapes and outdoor dining experiences.". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
